title: 2B/2B, Oversized walk-in closets, Situated in Henderson!
posting_body: ['South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', '-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Controlled-entry access', '-Professional onsite management', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station', '-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Exterior storage available', '-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Wood-style plank flooring', '-Ceiling fans in dining room', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
